allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, StartTime, WorkingSet | Format-Table -AutoSize")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process node | Where-Object {$_Id -ne 6992} | Select-Object Id, StartTime | Format-Table -AutoSize")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_Id -ne 6992} | Select-Object Id | ForEach-Object {Stop-Process -Id $_Id -Force}")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_Id -ne 6992} | ForEach-Object {Stop-Process -Id $_Id -Force}; Write-Host ''Procesos Node matados (excepto Claude Code)''")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 9998 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object State, OwningProcess | Format-Table -AutoSize")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id | Format-Table -AutoSize")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, StartTime | Format-Table -AutoSize")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, StartTime, WorkingSet | Sort-Object StartTime | Format-Table -AutoSize")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "$content = Get-Content ''C:\Bio\sistema_asistencia_biometrico\backend\server.js''; $content[1281] = ''/* COMENTADO - Endpoint duplicado que interceptaba userRoutes.js'' + [Environment]::NewLine + $content[1281]; $content[1399] = $content[1399] + [Environment]::NewLine + ''*/ // FIN endpoint duplicado''; $content | Set-Content ''C:\Bio\sistema_asistencia_biometrico\backend\server.js''")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 9998 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object OwningProcess | ForEach-Object {Stop-Process -Id $_OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}; Write-Host ''Proceso en puerto 9998 matado''")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 9999 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object OwningProcess | ForEach-Object {Stop-Process -Id $_OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}")

Bash(powershell -Command " $content = Get-Content ''public/panel-administrativo.html'' -Raw $newHeader = Get-Content ''temp_header.html'' -Raw # Buscar y reemplazar el header viejo $pattern = ''(?s)
.*?

.*?

\s*
\s*'' $content = $content -replace $pattern, $newHeader Set-Content ''public/panel-administrativo.html'' $content -NoNewline Write-Host ''Header reemplazado'' ")

Bash(powershell -Command " $content = Get-Content ''public/panel-administrativo.html'' -Raw $newLayout = Get-Content ''temp_sidebar_layout.html'' -Raw # Patrón para reemplazar desde las stats hasta inicio de tabs (incluye nav-tabs y buttons) $pattern = ''(?s)
\s*.*?
.*?
'' # Buscar y reemplazar $content = $content -replace $pattern, $newLayout Set-Content ''public/panel-administrativo.html'' $content -NoNewline Write-Host ''Sidebar layout aplicado'' ")

Bash(powershell -Command "
$content = Get-Content ''public/panel-administrativo.html'' -Raw
$newLayout = Get-Content ''temp_correct_layout.html'' -Raw

# Patrón para reemplazar desde dashboard-container hasta antes del primer tab-content
$pattern = ''(?s)<div class="""dashboard-container""".*?<!-- Pestaña Empresas -->''

# Reemplazar agregando el comentario de vuelta
$replacement = $newLayout + \`r\`n + ''                <!-- Pestaña Empresas -->''
$content = $content -replace $pattern, $replacement

Set-Content ''public/panel-administrativo.html'' $content -NoNewline
Write-Host ''Layout corregido: sidebar izquierda + contenido derecha''
")

Bash(powershell -Command "
(Get-Content panel-administrativo.html) | Where-Object {
    $_ -notmatch ''tech-badges\.css'' -and $_ -notmatch ''tech-badges\.js''
} | Set-Content panel-administrativo-temp.html
Move-Item panel-administrativo-temp.html panel-administrativo.html -Force
Write-Host ''Tech badges eliminadas del panel-administrativo''
")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_Id -ne $PID} | Select-Object Id, StartTime | Sort-Object StartTime | Format-Table -AutoSize")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_Id -eq 14152} | Select-Object Id, StartTime, WorkingSet | Format-Table -AutoSize")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object {$_ProcessName -like ''*node*'' -or $_ProcessName -like ''*nodemon*'' -or $_ProcessName -like ''*watch*''} | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, StartTime | Format-Table -AutoSize")
